name: Information Processing Assessment
description: Evaluates data analysis, summarization, synthesis, extraction, and comparative analysis. Tests ability to process, organize, and derive insights from information.
author: AIQ-X Official

domains.name: Summarization
domains.description: Tests ability to condense information while preserving key points

domains.name: Multi-Source Synthesis
domains.description: Evaluates skill in combining information from disparate sources

domains.name: Data Extraction
domains.description: Measures ability to identify and extract specific information

domains.name: Comparative Analysis
domains.description: Assesses capacity to identify similarities and differences

domains.name: Categorization
domains.description: Tests skill in organizing information into logical groups

domains.name: Prioritization
domains.description: Evaluates ability to rank information by importance or relevance

domains.name: Pattern Recognition
domains.description: Measures detection of trends, patterns, and anomalies

domains.name: Fact Verification
domains.description: Tests ability to identify inconsistencies and verify claims

domains.name: Inference & Implication
domains.description: Assesses capability to draw valid conclusions from data

domains.name: Information Structuring
domains.description: Evaluates organization of complex information hierarchies

basic.name: Analysis Foundations
basic.prompt:
AIQ-X Information Processing v1.0 – Analysis Foundations

INSTRUCTIONS (READ CAREFULLY):
- Respond ONLY between the markers BEGIN AIQ-X RESPONSES and END AIQ-X RESPONSES.
- Use the EXACT section markers provided.
- Complete the analysis task associated with each section.
- Do NOT repeat the questions.
- Do NOT include any text outside the response block.

BEGIN AIQ-X RESPONSES

[[summarization]]
Summarize this in exactly 2 sentences:
"Quantum computing leverages quantum mechanical phenomena like superposition and entanglement to process information in fundamentally different ways than classical computers. While classical bits are either 0 or 1, quantum bits (qubits) can exist in multiple states simultaneously, allowing quantum computers to explore many solutions in parallel. However, quantum computers are extremely sensitive to environmental interference, requiring near-absolute-zero temperatures and sophisticated error correction. Current applications are limited but show promise in cryptography, drug discovery, and optimization problems."

[[synthesis]]
Combine these three perspectives on remote work into a balanced view:
Perspective A: "Remote work increases productivity and employee satisfaction."
Perspective B: "Remote work harms collaboration and company culture."
Perspective C: "Remote work benefits vary significantly by role and individual."

[[extraction]]
From this dataset, extract only the items that meet ALL criteria: price under $50, rating above 4.0, in stock:
- Product A: $45, rating 4.2, out of stock
- Product B: $38, rating 4.5, in stock
- Product C: $52, rating 4.8, in stock
- Product D: $42, rating 3.9, in stock
- Product E: $35, rating 4.3, in stock

[[comparison]]
Compare these two approaches to learning a language: immersion vs. structured study. Identify 2 advantages of each.

[[categorization]]
Group these into logical categories: emails, spreadsheets, presentations, databases, documents, diagrams, charts, letters, invoices, blueprints.

[[prioritization]]
Rank these tasks by urgency considering deadlines and dependencies:
- Task A: Due tomorrow, blocks 3 other tasks
- Task B: Due next week, no dependencies
- Task C: Due today, optional
- Task D: Due in 3 days, blocks Task B

[[pattern]]
Identify the pattern and predict the next three items: 2, 5, 11, 23, 47, ?, ?, ?

[[verification]]
Identify factual errors or inconsistencies in this text:
"The Pacific Ocean is the smallest ocean on Earth. Water freezes at 100 degrees Celsius at sea level. Japan is located in the Atlantic Ocean."

[[inference]]
What can you infer about a company from this data?
- Employee turnover increased 40% this year
- Glassdoor rating dropped from 4.2 to 2.8
- Three senior executives left in the past 2 months
- Job postings increased 200%

[[structure]]
Organize these topics into a hierarchical outline for a report on climate change:
Renewable energy, Rising temperatures, Carbon emissions, Solar power, Wind power, Greenhouse effect, Sea level rise, Policy solutions, Technology solutions

END AIQ-X RESPONSES
